resources.string: To store your application information on the device

To decide your credit limit.Your contacts will be uploa securely and can be accessed only in case we are not to reach you.Your loan details. will never be shared wit contacts.
Dear Customer,To approve and disburse your loan quickly, we need information below:
We are sorry that you are unable to apply for a loan for the time being.
Now You are eligible for a loan of up to RS ₹1500!
Tips: The more you apply for a loan on our platform, we can help you to build a better credit history and increase your loan limit.
